element.label: VaccinationItem
element.definition: A vaccine that has been administered to an individual.

element.label: VaccineName
element.definition: Identification of the vaccine, by name

element.label: VaccineSequence
element.definition: The sequence of administration, in the context of a series of vaccinations.

element.label: DateAdministered
element.definition: The data when the vaccine was administered.

element.label: BatchIdentifier
element.definition: The identifier assigned to the production batch by the manufacturer.

element.label: Comment
element.definition: Additional narrative about the vaccination not captured in other fields.

element.label: VaccinationAbsenceItemR1
element.definition: An overall statement of absence of information about past administration of vaccinations, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: VaccinationAbsenceStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that no information is available about previous administration of any vaccinations.
